description: Highly durable polycarbonate light weight body Fully multi-coated lenses for maximum light transmission and brightness Fully waterproof. Easy to use, twist up eyecups. title: Kenko Binoculars Ultra View EX OP 8x32 DH2 Waterproof Roof Prism
